document_data.name: Fire genasi
document_data.mainbody:
A '''fire genasi''' was a type of [[genasi]] that was able to harness the power of fire.
{{quote|The pasha of [[Calimport]] keeps a harem of beauteous genasi, whose veiled dance of allure has been known to drive a hundred men to distraction at a time. It is not, however, until they lower their veils and reveal faces of flame that the true dance begins.|[[Shalis Ptolexis]], Celebrant of [[Sharess]], ''[[Wanderings in Love's Name]]''{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice||22}}}}

Description.Abilities: Fire genasi could summon nonmagical flame. They were also resistant to fire.

document_data.Personality: Fire genasi were generally energetic and quick to act, They often cared a great deal about their appearance, and dressed flamboyantly.

Society.Religion: Fire genasi could worship any deity, but clerics were devotees of [[Gond]], [[Talos]], or [[Kossuth]].

* [[Hurnoj Rikrekts]], servant of [[Krashos Morueme]] in [[Ched Nasad]].
